course_title: Race, Class and the Making of American Religion
class_notes: (HYBRID: class meets on campus Tuesdays 12:30pm-2:20pm; remaining contact time fulfilled via asynchronous online engagement)
course_description: This course examines the roles that race and class have played and continue to play in the shaping of religion in the U.S.
